00020 #ifndef NETWORK_TCPSERVERSOCKET_H
00021 #define NETWORK_TCPSERVERSOCKET_H
00022 
00023 #include <rdkcore/network/netexception.h>
00024 #include <rdkcore/network/tcpsocket.h>
00025 #include <rdkcore/network/inetaddress.h>
00026 #include <unistd.h>
00027 
00028 namespace Network {
00029 
00030 class TCPServerSocket {
00031     public:
00032         TCPServerSocket() throw();
00033         TCPServerSocket( unsigned short port, unsigned short backlog = 10 ) throw( TCPException, NetException );
00034         TCPServerSocket( const InetAddress& address, unsigned short backlog = 10 ) throw ( TCPException );
00035 
00036         ~TCPServerSocket() throw();
00037 
00038         void unbind() throw();
00039         inline void rebind() throw( TCPException ) { unbind(); bind(); }
00040         void bind( unsigned short port, unsigned short backlog = 10 ) throw( TCPException, NetException );
00041         void bind( const InetAddress& address, unsigned short backlog = 10 ) throw ( TCPException );
00042         
00043         TCPSocket* accept() throw( TCPException );
00044         
00045         inline const InetAddress& getAddress() { return address; }
00046 
00047     private:
00048         void bind() throw( TCPException );
00049     
00050     private:
00051         int socket;
00052         unsigned short backlog;
00053         InetAddress address;
00054 };
00055 
00056 }
